instance.context:
a round hardwood disk with holes and a grooved
perimeter used to tighten a shroud ;

a straight_line from the center to the
perimeter of a circle ( or from the center to the surface of a sphere ) ;

a straight_line connecting the center of a circle with two points on its
perimeter ( or the center of a sphere with two points on its surface ) ;

place upon another so that their
perimeters coincide ;
